content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Burner Mining Drill at position(40.0, -84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 40.0, -84.0)

### Wooden Chest at position(39.5, -85.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position 39.5, -85.5)

### Stone Furnace at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Original Stone Furnace (position 43.0, -82.0)

### Stone Furnace at position(45.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- New Stone Furnace (position 45.0, -82.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Check the inventory of furnaces before attempting to extract items to ensure they have the necessary ingredients to smelt.
